Standard Mate 10 is OLED.

Of course it will be no performance difference between Kirin 970, 980 or even 960 in real life. I just wanted to say that I'm not gonna pay such a high price for this year flagship phone with last year chipset. This is very wrong from principle. If Huawei would put Snapdragon 845 into P20, I'd buy it with no questions asked.

Mate 10 pro looks like the better phone overall. it has 6GB RAM, water resistance, 4000mah battery and an OLED screen. What I like about it also is the rear-mounted fingerprint reader, which to me is much easier to use than front-mounted. Only caveat is the lack of a headphone jack.
There is NO 3.5mm jack on this model.

Some Advantage of P20 over Mate Pro : 
1) Slightly Smaller phone so more reachable and the 5.8" display is not so smaller than mate 10's 6".  
2) Slightly Better Rear and Front Facing camera but Mate 10 Pro is also flagship grade.  
3) 3.5mm jack while Mate 10 pro doesn't have it.
 
Advantages of Mate 10 pro over P20 : 
1) 6" OLED Display and No notch. 
2) IP67 rating - water, and dust resistance. 
3) Bigger 4000 mAh battery while P20 has 3400 mAh battery. 
4) 32-bit/384kHz audio while p20 has 24-bit/192kHz audio. 
5) loudspeaker with stereo speakers
 
So mate 10 pro seems to be a good deal and I don't know what version you're getting cause mate 10 pro also comes in the 6gb/128gb variant which is also an advantage. 
And you should watch some reviews.

Brand new, latest model smartphone with last year chipset sounds dodgy by definition. All this reminds me the story with the latest Chinese jet fighter - J-20 Chendu which has ...engine from the previous model :).

Well I saw the Mate 10 new on Ebay sellers with gaurantee for 430 eur, the P20 was 650 eur here.
 
I don't know about the Mate 10, I just got one a few days ago and my camera doesn't seem good, maybe it's just me but it seems too soft and not sharp. (I changed from a OnePlus 5t and I thought the 5t camera wasn't good)
 
I don't think you should get the Mate 10 if it's the same price, I am sure the P20 is better because it's newer. (Also when you look for camera specs of the Mate 10 they don't publish the pixel sizes anywhere :/ only the f-stop).
 
So if it's the same price, go for the p20 for sure. Maybe Oneplus just has fast phones but the mate 10 also seems slow when going through the OS.

Hi,  
This should be your own decision. 
I wanted to buy to Mate 10 pro, but I didn't like size, it was too big for me. 
Therefore I have waited and already ordered the P20, basically the same specs minus the battery and IP proofing. Smaller body size, improved camera and I like the design better. And its a fresher model and also slightly cheaper.

Guys, I have a serious problem. I can not choose between the Huawei mate 10 Pro or the Huawei P20? Who has an suggestion and why?
Which one should I choose and why? The Huawei mate 10 Pro or the Huawei P20. Help me guys

Personally i feel the P series phones are better than the Samsung S range because of price. I currently have the P9 Lite and while this is considered an entry level phone at around R2600 brand new it fairs really well against the S series, the only phones in the S series which currently outdo it are the S8 and S9. In saying this the P9lite has half as many features as the P20 so i have no doubt that the P20 will outdo the S8 and S9.... with regards to pricing and features. the main feature on the S8 that outdoes the P9 lite is the camera however the P20 outdoes the P9lite second to none with regards to camera. The interface of the Huawei is very user friendly and the phones come with the developer option which can be accessed on the S series but it is not a standard feature that shows up , you must know what you are doing to access this feature which i guess is to help avoid unwanted changes in terms of developer mode but if you know what you are doing then the Huawei offers a better developer option with more features. Im a solid Huawei fan..... i must say though that i used to be a solid S series fan and never had phones which werent part of the S series so Huawei has stolen me away
They're both very good. Get the cheapest of the two or the one that looks nicest to you. Not just body, but user interface as well

Wow apple attempted to make a full screen phone but with a notch cause somehow they canÂt take away the front camera, front stereo speakers, mic and other sensors which are very important. Now that a lot of android phones emerge with the same notch but not with the same technology that it houses. The notch of the iphone X was not meant for the design alone but with a purpose. Lol. How come that there are too many manufacturers out there canÂt make up on their design that they even manage to copy the positioning of the camera? Most of these copycats however failed to make their own version of iphone X in making it look like fuller as it has thick bezel at the bottom. Crazy. It doesnÂt even look proportion (with the exception of the notch) since the bezels around the corner are not uniform. I donÂt understand why would big manufacturers out there such as huawei, Asus, LG, Vivo and Oppo would just shamelessly copy the design of apple with their iphone X versions. Apple has been very good with the performance of their camera in their iphones for years now however I still prefer Nokia for firing photos and they were very advance since day 1 with the raw images! I was so sad with the recently released huawei p20 boasting their camera when I think IÂve seen it all back in nokia days.
